subject: Simsonn Racing Simulator Carbon Fiber and Aluminum Steering Wheel Hub
description_text:
I purchased one of the buttons boxes on Amazon back in February. It is now not working. What is the warranty period as my protection plan is declining to take care of it?


Regards.



Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi James Betha,    What issue are you experiencing? Software issues can usually be resolved, and we can try to fix it. You can send us a video of the problem via Google Drive.
ID 为 2607 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单2607  
      主题: Simsonn button box  
      描述:  
I purchased a button box on Amazon in February and now it is not working. What is the warranty period for the product. 
 
 
 
 
Regards.

此工单已关闭并合并至工单 2608。

I have a picture of the error I'm receiving in windows. I think there maybe an issue with the USB cable itself.
